entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 16. POP 60%
